alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 3:10PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN HOUSTON...JACKSON... NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON...NORTHWESTERN DECATUR AND SEMINOLE COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT/245 PM CDT/... At 309 PM EDT/209 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chipley to 12 miles northwest of Chattahoochee. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Chipley, Donalsonville, Marianna, Chattahoochee, Malone, Sneads, Cottondale, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Madrid, Iron City, Campbellton, Brinson, Bascom, Crosby, Grangeburg, Lovedale, Dellwood, and Donaldsonville A/P. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
